segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 7
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 7

segments.pli: 3. Vajjisattakavagga
segments.en: 3. The Vajji Seven

segments.pli: 21. Sārandadasutta
segments.en: 21. At Sārandada

segments.pli: Evaṃ me sutaṃ—
segments.en: So I have heard.

segments.pli: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati sārandade cetiye.
segments.en: At one time the Buddha was staying near Vesālī, at the Sārandada Tree-shrine.

segments.pli: Atha kho sambahulā licchavī yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Ekamantaṃ nisinne kho te licchavī bhagavā etadavoca:
segments.en: Then several Licchavis went up to the Buddha, bowed, sat down to one side, and the Buddha said to these Licchavis:

segments.pli: “satta vo, licchavī, aparihāniye dhamme desessāmi.
segments.en: “Licchavis, I will teach you these seven principles that prevent decline.

segments.pli: Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
segments.en: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”

segments.pli: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te licchavī bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
segments.en: “Yes, sir,” they replied.

segments.pli: Bhagavā etadavoca:
segments.en: The Buddha said this:

segments.pli: “Katame ca, licchavī, satta aparihāniyā dhammā?
segments.en: “And what are the seven principles that prevent decline?

segments.pli: Yāvakīvañca, licchavī, vajjī abhiṇhaṃ sannipātā bhavissanti sannipātabahulā;
segments.en: As long as the Vajjis meet frequently and have many meetings,

segments.pli: vuddhiyeva, licchavī, vajjīnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni. (1)
segments.en: they can expect growth, not decline.

segments.pli: Yāvakīvañca, licchavī, vajjī samaggā sannipatissanti, samaggā vuṭṭhahissanti, samaggā vajjikaraṇīyāni karissanti;
segments.en: As long as the Vajjis meet in harmony, leave in harmony, and carry on their business in harmony,

segments.pli: vuddhiyeva, licchavī, vajjīnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni. (2)
segments.en: they can expect growth, not decline.

segments.pli: Yāvakīvañca, licchavī, vajjī apaññattaṃ na paññāpessanti, paññattaṃ na samucchindissanti, yathāpaññatte porāṇe vajjidhamme samādāya vattissanti;
segments.en: As long as the Vajjis don’t make new decrees or abolish existing decrees, but undertake and follow the traditional Vajjian principles as they have been decreed,

segments.pli: vuddhiyeva, licchavī, vajjīnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni. (3)
segments.en: they can expect growth, not decline.

segments.pli: Yāvakīvañca, licchavī, vajjī ye te vajjīnaṃ vajjimahallakā te sakkarissanti garuṃ karissanti mānessanti pūjessanti, tesañca sotabbaṃ maññissanti;
segments.en: As long as the Vajjis honor, respect, esteem, and venerate Vajjian elders, and think them worth listening to,

segments.pli: vuddhiyeva, licchavī, vajjīnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni. (4)
segments.en: they can expect growth, not decline.

segments.pli: Yāvakīvañca, licchavī, vajjī yā tā kulitthiyo kulakumāriyo tā na okassa pasayha vāsessanti;
segments.en: As long as the Vajjis don’t rape or abduct women or girls from their families and force them to live with them,

segments.pli: vuddhiyeva, licchavī, vajjīnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni. (5)
segments.en: they can expect growth, not decline.

segments.pli: Yāvakīvañca, licchavī, vajjī yāni tāni vajjīnaṃ vajjicetiyāni abbhantarāni ceva bāhirāni ca tāni sakkarissanti garuṃ karissanti mānessanti pūjessanti, tesañca dinnapubbaṃ katapubbaṃ dhammikaṃ baliṃ no parihāpessanti;
segments.en: As long as the Vajjis honor, respect, esteem, and venerate the Vajjian shrines, whether inner or outer, not neglecting the proper spirit-offerings that were given and made in the past,

segments.pli: vuddhiyeva, licchavī, vajjīnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni. (6)
segments.en: they can expect growth, not decline.

segments.pli: Yāvakīvañca, licchavī, vajjīnaṃ arahantesu dhammikā rakkhāvaraṇagutti susaṃvihitā bhavissati:
segments.en: As long as the Vajjis arrange for proper protection, shelter, and security for perfected ones, so that

segments.pli: ‘kinti anāgatā ca arahanto vijitaṃ āgaccheyyuṃ, āgatā ca arahanto vijite phāsuṃ vihareyyun’ti;
segments.en: more perfected ones might come to the realm and those already here may live in comfort,

segments.pli: vuddhiyeva, licchavī, vajjīnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni. (7)
segments.en: they can expect growth, not decline.

segments.pli: Yāvakīvañca, licchavī, ime satta aparihāniyā dhammā vajjīsu ṭhassanti, imesu ca sattasu aparihāniyesu dhammesu vajjī sandississanti;
segments.en: As long as these seven principles that prevent decline last among the Vajjis, and as long as the Vajjis are seen following them,

segments.pli: vuddhiyeva, licchavī, vajjīnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihānī”ti.
segments.en: they can expect growth, not decline.”

segments.pli: Paṭhamaṃ.

suttaplex.blurb: The Buddha teaches the seven principles of non-decline to the Licchavis at the Sārandada shrine near Vesālī.
